attributes.action: Make it a choice as to whether to receive BBC broadcasting
attributes.additional_details: In this day and age there must be a way to stop people paying for a licence if they do not watch the BBC
attributes.background: Let people choose not to recieve.BBC channels and not pay a tv licence fee.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597886
